Q: Hi Doc I am a hypertensive patient. I have been taking approvel 150for 5 years now and recently my Doctor change it to micardis plus. But I want to get pregnant and it seems like micardis plus is not suitable for those trying to conceive. Please advise.
A: Hi. I've gone through your query. I can understand your anxiety. Progestin has side effects like dizziness, Breast pain or tenderness, vomiting, Constipation or diarrhea etc. are common. Other known side effect is spotting or breakthrough bleeding, irregular cycles which gradually become regular again. So relax yourself & if its troublesome have a word with your gynecologist. Hope I have answered your query. Let me know if I can assist you further. Take care.
